OOC: i'm controling Menasor this fight (just so there is no 
confusion)

--- Dead-End / Drag Strip / Menasor ---

Dead-End and Drag Strip form their car modes and rev their engins. 
Motormaster forms the torso of Menasor, Drag Strip, and Dead-End 
form his arms, Speedbreaker and Wildrider form his legs. The 
massive super warrior stands tall, as Menasor's head comes up 
from the top of his torso. "Menasor, cruuusssshhhhh..." He 
punches the CF, only to find himself punching the ground!

Menasor turns to the next biggest thing: Element (g). He fires his 
cyclone gun four times at Element (g), and starts walking towards 
the other gestalt.



On 12 May 2001, at 15:54, robertdahl wrote:

> OOC: Sorry I havent posted for a while. I've been doing my dream job
> for a few days (no not wrestling) babysitting dogs :) Tommorow I
> should be around more often.
> 
> BIC:
> Megatron and Speedbreaker exit Astroblast. Megatron stays in the
> hatchway, but Speedbreaker joins his comerades.
> 
> Motormaster floats out of the way of the plasma blast, as he tries to
> head towards Megatron, but he dosent see the explosive shells coming
> towards him. The impact creates a hug explosion in mid air, and out of
> the explosion appears Motormaster who plunges to the ground. He
> strains to get up, and through wheezing breath he salute Megatron.
> 
> Wildrider, strugles to get up, and transforms, the side of the car
> that turns into his shoulder is damaged. "Come with me if you want to
> live your destiny Shockwave" he says, as he roars off.
> 
> Megatron receives the information from the Avian, but he was busy
> right now. He stepped over to Astroblasts controls, and turned on the
> speakers (this isnt a radio wave, it's a normal speaker, so it just
> intensifies the noise). "SURGITAL" it boomed over the battle field.
> "GET OVER HERE, MEGATRON COMMANDS IT". He then looked down at the
> Stunticons. "MERGE" he ordered. 
> 
> Motormaster hearing this stepped forward. "Stunticons, transform, and
> start your engines" he ordered, as he Speedbreaker and Wildrider
> transformed into car mode, and began to rev their engines.
